description:
Get God’s Word for free on your devices with the Bible App by YouVersion. Connect with God through Scripture by reading, listening, Plans, Daily Refresh, Verse of the Day, and so much more!

Choose from 1,750+ languages and 2,500+ Bible versions. Make it your Bible by adding Friends, choosing Plans, creating Verse Images, highlighting, and making notes.

Bring your friends with you and explore the Bible together. Have honest conversations about Scripture. Grow together and share what you discover.

People are reading, listening to, watching, and sharing the free Bible App by YouVersion on over 500 million devices worldwide. Join the global Community today! Download the Bible App.


EXPLORE GOD’S WORD
* Choose from thousands of Bible versions in over 1,750 languages
* Pick from over 60 languages for your Bible App interface
* Download select Bible versions to access when you’re offline
* Listen to select Bible versions and enjoy skip, playback speed, and timer controls.
* Learn more about the Verse of the Day in Guided Scripture with an engaging video and personal reflection questions
* Tap through Scripture and prayer prompts in Guided Prayer, or write your own prayers using the Prayer feature
* Choose from thousands of Plans that focus on specific topics, portions of Scripture, or the entire Bible in a year
* Watch videos from Christian organizations such as Bible Project and The Chosen
* Search for what the Bible says about any topic you’re wondering about
* Tap on a verse to see your Notes and related content such as videos, Plans, and study notes

MAKE IT YOUR BIBLE
* Themes let you select a color palette for your entire Bible App experience
* Create and download Verse Images for any verse you’d like—it’s shareable art
* Highlight with custom colors and create notes
* Bookmark passages to share, memorize, and keep at the front of your mind
* Share verses with friends using social media, email, or text
* Add notes on any verse—make them private or let your Friends see them
* Access your account from any supported device
* Adjust lighting, font, font size, and line spacing for easy reading

BRING YOUR FRIENDS ALONG
* Center your friendships around Scripture by adding your Friends to the Bible App
* See an activity feed that shows what you and your Friends are noting, bookmarking, and highlighting
* Comment on the Verse of the Day with your Friends—ask questions and share how God is speaking to you
* Write your own prayers and share them with your Friends to pray together
* Do Plans together and discuss what you’re learning

CONNECT WITH YOUVERSION
* Contact Support from inside the Bible App
* Join the @youversion Community on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, TikTok & Pinterest
* Catch up on the latest at blog.youversion.com
* Access the Bible online at bible.com

Download the world’s #1 Bible App and enjoy the Bible experience loved by millions!

Bible Chat: Built for Christians Who Want to Hear God in the Noise of Everyday Life

Have you made time for God’s Word today? Join millions of believers who’ve chosen the #1 faith app in the world. Download Bible Chat today!

Life is noisy. Fast. Overwhelming. Even when you’re trying to stay close to God, it’s easy to feel spiritually disconnected.

Bible Chat is the ultimate all-in-one Christian app designed to make Bible reading, prayer, and Christian community a part of your everyday life. It is for Christians who want peace - real peace - anchored in Scripture.


Whether you're a lifelong Christian or just starting your journey, Bible Chat gives you everything you need to:

• Understand the Bible Better - Learn what the Bible really means with helpful guides and simple explanations that make God's Word easier to follow and apply.

• Grow Your Prayer Habit - Build a consistent prayer routine supported by daily  inspiration and the power of a praying community.

• Make Faith Part of Your Day - Improve your daily routine with spiritual prompts, Christian calendar reminders, and faith tools designed for the whole family.

• Support Your Mental Health - Find peace and calm in moments of stress with simple tools that help you refocus on God’s strength.

• Make Faith Fun and Interactive - Enjoy fun and easy ways to learn, think, and talk about how faith fits into your everyday life.


Key Features to Explore:

• Daily Plan: Stay on track with your faith. Follow a simple daily plan that helps you grow closer to God, one step at a time.

• Structured Bible Study Plans: Follow simple Bible reading plans made for real life. Some of the topics include: healing, wisdom, leadership, grief, and more.

•  Holy Calendar: See important Christian days in a monthly view. Never miss a feast, saint day, or holy event again.

• Panic Button: Struggling with stress or temptation? Tap the Panic Button for guided deep breathing exercises that calm the mind and provide anxiety relief.

• Live Prayer: Share your prayer intentions, and let's pray together to grow closer to God.

• Send a Blessing:  Send a Bible verse with a kind message straight to a friend’s phone. Add a heart or doodle to make it personal and uplifting.

• Bible Stories for Kids: Turn screen time into faith time! Show fun, Bible-based stories and videos to your kids.

• Multiple Bible Versions: Read the Bible the way you like best. Choose from NKJV, KJV, WMB, FBV, World English Bible, Amplified, and NASB.

• Bible Verse Widget: See a new Bible verse every day, right on your lock screen or home screen.

• Bible Trivia: Challenge and enhance your biblical knowledge through interactive trivia games.

• Verse Locator: Looking for a verse? Search and find it fast, along with what it means.

• Personalized Devotionals & Prayers: Start your day with custom devotionals and write your own prayers to stay closer to God.

• Biblical Character Profiles: Learn about the people in the Bible: their stories, struggles, and how God worked in their lives.

• Let's Discuss Faith: Join honest chats about how faith connects to your real life - like work, family, and relationships.


Experience More with Premium:
Unlock unlimited conversations, full access to every feature, and exclusive designs for your Daily Prayer Widgets. Start with a FREE 7-day trial, then choose our weekly plan at £4.99 or opt for extended plans for greater savings.


Privacy Policy & Terms and Conditions:
https://thebiblechat.com/privacy-policy/
https://thebiblechat.com/terms-and-conditions/


Join Our Thriving Community:
Join a friendly community of people who love God or are just starting to learn. With Bible Chat and the new Send a Blessing Widget, you can make Bible verses and prayer part of your everyday conversations.

Also it allows you to download songs from your cloud storages. It supports Dropbox®.

It is easy to use and useful. You can enjoy listening to songs without wifi.

Main Features: 
√ Download songs from your cloud storages.
√ Play downloaded songs with a powerful player.
√ Play local iPod songs with a powerful player.
√ Provide 3 play modes: normal, single, shuffle.
√ Manage your playlists.

How to use:
1. On the tab 'Cloud' choose the cloud platform Dropbox.
2. Click the Sign In icon button at the right top corner of the cloud platform section.
3. Connect to Dropbox and use your account. (If you have no account, you should register one.)
4. Get songs from your cloud storage. (You should upload your preferred songs to your cloud storage by yourself.)
5. Choose a downloaded songs to play and enjoy it.

Speak and understand any language instantly! Want to break language barriers easily and naturally? Check out Translate Now*Voice Translator. Talk, type, or take a picture to get fast and accurate translations. With this smart and easy translation app, real-time communication is possible wherever you are.  

  

Translate conversations, menus, signs, and documents using helpful tools like voice translator and get desired information in your language with the help of a photo translator. Whether you're traveling, studying, or meeting new people, a voice language translator helps you communicate smoothly with others from different countries.  

  

Some Main Features of Translate Now*Voice Translator:  

• Voice Translator for instant speaking  

• Camera Translator for reading printed text  

• Photo Translator for text in pictures  

• Text Translator for messages and content  

• Real time language translator for fast typing  

  

Voice Translator: Speak into your phone and get clear translations. Voice language translator is reliable tool for daily conversations. Voice Translator lets you speak freely and hear your words in another language. You don’t need to type. Just talk and translate using this real time translator.  

  

Camera Translator: Place your camera at a sign, page, or label and get instant results. The camera translator enables you to read things around you when visiting new places or reading unfamiliar content in a different language.  

  

Photo Translator: Snap a photo, and the translation app will scan and translate the text in seconds. The photo translator is useful for travel, shopping, or understanding documents in a new language.  

  

Text Translator: Type or paste any sentence and get fast and accurate translations. Text translator works well for messages, websites, and more.   

  

Real time translator: While typing a message, see translations as you go. Language translator works great in chats, forms, or emails. Real time translator tool makes typing in other languages fast and smooth.  

  

Japanese & Spanish translator: Translate Now works in many popular languages. Use it as a Spanish translator when visiting Spanish-speaking areas. Language translator also works as a Japanese translator and helps with Arabic, Korean, French, and many other languages. This complete translation app helps you understand and respond in new languages with confidence.  

  

Benefits of Translate Now*Voice Translator:  

• Easily communicate with people around the world  

• Use camera, photo, voice, or text translator tools  

• Translate offline with saved phrases  

• Travel confidently and work globally  

• Speak and translate using simple tools  

• Build vocabulary while using the voice translator app  

• Translate easily into any language by using a voice language translator  

  

Download Translate Now*Voice Translator app and enjoy simple & fast translation around the world.

Discover the power of words with the Oxford Dictionary, the definitive language resource trusted by millions around the world. This comprehensive app, powered by Oxford Languages, offers a wealth of linguistic tools to help you achieve your language goals.

■ 15 OXFORD DICTIONARIES AT YOUR FINGERTIPS: 
•	Access a vast collection of dictionaries for English, French, German, Spanish, Russian, Chinese, Italian, Hindi, Urdu, Portuguese, Japanese, Greek, Bulgarian, and Thai.

■ UNMATCHED LANGUAGE CONTENT:
•	The Latest Word Database from Oxford Languages
•	Explore over 1 million words, phrases, and definitions
•	Thesaurus Integration - find the perfect word with thousands of synonyms and antonyms
•	Audio Pronunciations - perfect your pronunciation with high-quality voice recordings
•	Etymology and Origins - uncover the fascinating histories behind words
•	Specialised Content - quickly locate topic-specific references
•	Word of the Day - expand your vocabulary one word at a time

■ KEY FEATURES AND INTUITIVE DESIGN:
•	Favourites - save and organize words into personalized folders
•	Recent - quickly revisit recently searched words
•	Auto-correction option - correct the spelling of any word, as you type it 
•	Spread the word! Share your linguistic discoveries with friends, colleagues, or on social media

■ ADVANCED SEARCH OPTIONS:
•	Search autocomplete - displays predictions as you type
•	Keyword lookup - search within compound words and phrases
•	Camera search - look up words in the camera viewfinder
•	Voice and fuzzy search - find an entry when you don’t know how a word is spelled

■ THE OXFORD DICTIONARY IS IDEAL FOR:
•	Professionals improving workplace communication
•	Writers and journalists crafting impactful content  
•	Students preparing for tests like IELTS, TOEFL, ACT, SAT, or NAPLAN
•	Academics and specialists requiring accurate, field-specific terminology 
•	Word enthusiasts and vocabulary builders  

■ UPGRADE TO PREMIUM AND UNLOCK MORE: 
-	Unlimited Database Access - search without limits
-	Audio Pronunciations - perfect your pronunciation
-	Offline and Fast mode - access the wealth of the word database anywhere, anytime - no data or internet connection is required 
-	Thesaurus - access your word arsenal for millions of synonyms and antonyms 
-	Regular Update - stay current with the latest language trends and word entries
-	Ad-Free Experience - focus on learning without distractions

■ WHY CHOOSE OXFORD DICTIONARY?
•	Accuracy and Reliability - trusted by language experts and learners worldwide
•	Comprehensive Coverage - from casual word lovers to academics, this app has it all
•	User-Friendly Design - a seamless experience for all
•	Your Language Journey Starts Here

Download the Oxford Dictionary today and embark on a journey of linguistic discovery. Whether you're a student, professional, or simply curious about language, this app is your ultimate language companion.

"Pray Daily" is your invitation to a deeper, more meaningful relationship with the Divine. Immerse yourself in a spiritual haven, where every tap, every scroll, every interaction brings you one step closer to the heart of God. Designed for the devoted soul, this app seamlessly combines time-tested scriptures with modern functionalities to guide, inspire, and enlighten.

Deepen Your Connection Through Prayer
Harness the profound power of prayer. With "Pray Daily," every morning ushers in hope, and every night brings solace. Our extensive database of verses ensures that your conversations with God are always heartfelt and sincere, allowing you to express your most profound feelings, aspirations, and desires with ease.

Elevate Your Scripture Reading Experience
"Pray Daily" has been built to enhance your scripture reading. Revel in the divine teachings, customize your reading experience, and let the words of the Lord resonate. From adding notes to highlighting significant passages, and from listening to calming Bible audios during daily commutes to having His word guide you even without an internet connection, the scriptures have never been this accessible.

AI Priest - The Fusion of Faith & Technology
In moments of doubt, introspection, or simply seeking understanding, turn to our advanced AI Priest. This modern marvel, powered by cutting-edge technology and infused with biblical wisdom, stands ready to assist, advise, and guide you in all spiritual matters.

Challenge and Relax with Bible Trivia
Add a dose of fun to your spiritual journey. Dive into our extensive collection of Bible trivia, quizzes, and challenges. Perfect for both ardent Bible scholars and those seeking a relaxed yet enlightening activity. Every quiz brings a new opportunity to learn, reflect, and grow.

Structured Spiritual Growth
Guidance is paramount in one's journey of faith. Our selection of Bible plans is curated to cater to diverse needs. Be it deepening understanding, seeking emotional healing, or simply walking a path of enlightenment, "Pray Daily" has a plan tailored just for you.

A Global Church Experience
Our interactive Bible games not only provide moments of relaxation but also reward you with captivating views of sacred sanctuaries from across the globe. Each jigsaw puzzle piece you collect unlocks a new perspective, a new beacon of faith.

Chronicle Every Step with God
Your spiritual journey is precious. With "Pray Daily," every insight, every revelation, and every heartfelt prayer is preserved, letting you revisit and reflect upon these cherished moments anytime.

Key Features:

A rich, immersive prayer platform for conversations with God.
Extensive personalization in scripture reading.
Instant guidance with the AI Priest feature.
Engaging Bible trivia to test and expand your knowledge.
Curated Bible study plans to guide your spiritual journey.
Unlock breathtaking visuals of churches worldwide.
Detailed logs and records of your spiritual milestones.

Join a global community of believers, deepening their faith, and drawing closer to God every day. Download "Pray Daily" now.

description:
Welcome to the Good News Bible GNB on your phone. 

This Bible can help you! Enjoy this easy and intuitive app to use the holy word at your fingertips! Discover this beautiful temple of truth now on your phone or tablet! access your GNB from anywhere!  

The Good News Bible GNB is a collection of ancient writings that contain records of God's dealings and instructions to His children. The word Bible is of Greek origin and means "books". Although we often think of the Holy Bible as a single book, it is actually a divine library bound in a single volume.

Good News Bible (GNB), also called the Good News Translation (GNT) in the United States, is an English translation.

Read and learn the word of the Lord with our APP containing the versions of Good.

BENEFITS:

- Access to the books of the Good News Bible GNB Offline
- Complete with all chapters of Old and New testament
- Read Offline : Read Bible even without internet access other Bibles can’t do that!
- User Friendly Interface : Simple but powerful design for easy to use. Browse by books or chapters.
- You can copy the texts of the App and share them.
- Easy to use, with your face and still being able to use it, you will need internet access.
- Portable to use. No more book. Go with you everywhere
- Allows you to move between chapters.
- Orientation Support (Portrait, Landscape)
- Works on All devices.
- Possibility of increasing or decreasing the size of the letter of the text
- Easy to use interface
- Navigate the Bible quickly and easily
- You can copy the texts of the Holy app and share them
- Internet connection is not necessary for its operation
- User-friendly interface and quick access to books, chapters and verses.
- Adjust the text size (zoom)

It is not enough just to be Christian, it is necessary to have a Good News Bible GNB application installed on your cell phone!

The Holy Bible Application Good News Bible GNB is considered an efficient tool for the study of the word of God, the intellectual author is God.

In this application you will find what you need for your soul !!!

The app Good News Bible also contains:

- Theology Dictionary: Completely offline so that you can consult when you want all the definitions and terms about theology.
- Bible Verses By Topic.
- Questions about Theology: A lot of questions and answers that will expand our knowledge about our Lord and his Word.
- Bible Survey.
- Daily Gospel.
- Additional features.

Download the Good News bible GNB and start your day fresh with a daily verse and carry your soft-copy of the Good News Bible with you anytime and anyplace you are or wish to go, and share God's Word to spread light and love to your close ones. This App offers immaculate friendly features that will make your daily Bible reading a wonderful experience.

Keep Tabs on Your Health with Ease – All in One Handy App

Whether you're keeping an eye on your heart or just like to stay on top of your numbers, our health record app makes it simple to log and organize your personal wellness info — all in one place.

Track What Matters Most
Easily record your blood pressure, heart rate, and oxygen levels right from your phone. Over time, you’ll be able to spot trends, share your records with your doctor, or just enjoy peace of mind knowing everything’s right where you need it.

Healthy Lifestyle, Made Simple
Taking care of yourself doesn’t have to be complicated. Our app helps support a healthier routine by encouraging you to stay mindful of your daily health through simple, consistent logging.

No Tech Headaches Here
We designed the app to be straightforward and easy to use. Whether you’ve been using smartphones for years or are just getting started, the clean layout makes recording your info quick and stress-free.

Your Health, Your Privacy
Your personal health data belongs to you, and only you. We take your privacy seriously. All records are stored securely and can’t be accessed without your permission.

Tips for Making It a Habit

·Set a Daily Reminder: A gentle nudge can go a long way. Set a reminder that fits your routine—like right after your morning coffee or before bedtime.
·Use Notes to Add Context: Feeling tired? Stressed? Add a quick note with your entry. These little details can be helpful when reviewing trends later.
·Celebrate Consistency: The more regularly you log, the more useful your data becomes. Even a quick daily check-in helps build a clearer picture over time.
·Share with Your Doctor: Bring your phone to your next appointment. Having a history of your readings can lead to more informed conversations.


Feel More in Control of Your Health

With our app, it’s easier than ever to stay informed about your health and keep track of important numbers—all without the overwhelm.

- Please note: This app is intended for personal tracking only. It is not a diagnostic tool and should not replace professional medical advice. Please consult your doctor with any health concerns.

Never Lose a WhatsApp Memory: Secure Backup, Text-to-Speech & Translation with Backup WA Chat Media

Say goodbye to lost WhatsApp moments and communication barriers!

Backup WA Chat Media empowers you to create secure backups of your entire WhatsApp chat history, including media, while offering unique features to enhance your experience:

Complete WhatsApp Backup:  Safeguard your chats, photos, videos, links, and documents with our comprehensive WhatsApp chat backup solution.

Effortless Backup Creation:  Creating a WA backup is a breeze with Backup WA Chat Media. Just a few taps and you have a secure copy of your conversations, giving you peace of mind.

Offline Storage: All your backed-up chats are stored securely offline on your device, accessible only through the app.

Text-to-Speech: Struggling to read on the go? Simply tap and hold any chat to have Backup WA Chat Media read it out loud using Text-to-Speech.

Chat Translation: Don't let language barriers hold you back! Tap and hold any chat to translate it into a language you understand with our built-in translation feature.

Secure Backup with Face Lock:  For added security, you can enable Face Lock to protect your backed-up chats from unauthorized access.

Import & Organize Backups:  Effortlessly import chats from WhatsApp, WhatsApp Business, Google Drive, File Manager, or anywhere you've saved them. Our intuitive interface lets you easily browse and organize your WhatsApp chat backups.

Familiar WhatsApp Feel:  Navigate your chats, media, and messages with a layout that mirrors WhatsApp. This makes transitioning to managing your WA backups a smooth experience.

Export Backup Freedom:  Move your WhatsApp backups to your computer or other storage options for additional protection.

Please note: Once you delete the app or a chat from Backup WA Chat Media, it cannot be retrieved. Ensure you create a new backup if you reinstall the app.

This app does not directly interact with or modify the WhatsApp application.This description incorporates "WhatsApp Backup," "WhatsApp chat Backup," and "WA Backup" five times each,  while highlighting the Text-to-Speech, Chat Translation, and secure offline storage features. It also includes a clear disclaimer about chat retrieval after app deletion.

Astrology of the Magical Chinese Five Elements for Your Destiny - The Magical Chinese Fortune-telling Device

Producer: Master Miao You (Graduated in U.S.A. with a Master Degree, M.Sc.)

“The Astrology of the Magical Chinese Five Elements for Your Destiny” is also known as “Magic Eight Words Numerology” or “Four Pillars of Destiny” .

If a person wants to have big cause, big wealth and rank, big success; or to make big money, to get big wealth, to get fame and benefit, and have prosperous fortune being an official, then he must have big fortune to support him. If he does not have big fortune to support, then all the above aims can only be empty talk and a dream.

Throughout the ages, so many big heroes, big talents, big businessmen, and billionaires who are powerful for a time, said at first they did not believe the fate, but at last they had nothing to own, and their final ends were having to bow to the fate. Therefore, the main purpose of this program is to enable reader users to predict your own fortune, to foreknow which stage of your life is the best fortune and best opportunity for you, then you can fully develop your own cause; and should stably defend during the period of bad fortune to make you stand in an invincible place, then you will be able to advance or retreat properly, and will be successful on great cause, and this is just the superior and unique point and the spirit of this program.

Therefore, this program is not to analyze your fate by long-winded discussion. Welcome to the NIV Bible!

This special NIV Bible app (brought to you by Biblica & Zondervan) allows you to stream and download for FREE the complete New International Version (NIV), New International Revised Version (NIrV), and Nueva Versión Internacional (NVI) text when you create an account. Try out for free the top NIV Bibles like the NIV Study Bible, NIV Application Bible, NIV MacArthur Study Bible and NIV Cultural Backgrounds Study Bible.

The NIV is the most widely read and trusted Bible translation in contemporary English. The NIV delivers the very best combination of accuracy, readability, and clarity, making it easy to read and easy to understand. 

If you would like to learn more about Biblica’s ministry across the globe or support their work, please visit Biblica.com. For more information about the NIV translation, please visit theNIVBible.com.

About the New International Version (NIV):

The NIV Bible is…

Accurate.
The NIV translators are united by their conviction that the Bible is God’s inspired Word. That, along with their individual expertise and years of studying biblical languages, helps them to capture subtle nuances and the depth of meaning in the Bible.

Readable.
The NIV text has been carefully and thoughtfully designed to provide the best reading experience possible. Each phrase has been purposefully crafted with the end user in mind, and the NIV’s 8th- grade reading level makes it accessible to most English readers around the world. 

Clear.
The Bible should be every bit as clear to you as it was to its original audience. The NIV translators take great care to balance accuracy, readability, and clarity using global English as it is spoken today.

Beautiful.
The NIV translators also prioritize literary beauty, resulting in a Bible translation that’s suitable for both private and public reading.

Trustworthy.
The NIV is translated by an independent, self-governing team of Bible scholars using the oldest and most reliable Bible manuscripts available today. No publisher, ministry, or other group can tell the committee how to translate God’s Word and there are safeguards in place to avoid theological bias. 

App Features:
Stream and download the NIV, NIrV, and NVI FREE for offline use when you create an account. Begin your day with a daily verse and devotional reminder. Find Scripture easily using a word or phrase. Personalize your Bible reading experience by using highlights, margin notes and split screens. Listen to the Bible with text-to-speech audio, study with multiple views and take notes with our journal rich-text note editor.

Over thirty Study Bibles and Commentary, including the top selling NIV Study Bible. Other Study Bibles and commentaries include the NIV Application Bible, NIV MacArthur Study Bible, NIV Cultural Backgrounds Study Bible, NIV Biblical Theology Study Bible, Celebrate Recovery Bible, NIV Streams in the Desert Bible, NIV Essentials Study Bible, NIV Faith and Work Bible, NIV First Century Study Bible, NIV Foundation Study Bible, NIV Quest Study Bible, NIV Life Journey Bible and more. 

Other features include the ability to start a group plan or prayer list with family and friends, share verses via email, text, Twitter or Facebook, dark or light mode, read free reading plans or create your own custom plan, change font styles and sizes and sync across your favorite devices (phone, tablet and web).

Have app questions or feature suggestions? Contact us at support@nivapp.bible

Picture Bird is a useful and smart bird identifier app that can recognize any bird species by photo or sound. Simply take/upload a picture of a bird or record a bird's sound, and you can get everything you want to know about it. 

Key Features:

Accurate Bird ID:
With machine deep learning technology in pictures and sound recognition, the Picture Bird app can identify up to 10,000+ bird species with incredible accuracy. Users can either upload a bird picture or record a bird song or call, and the app will compare it with training sets of millions of photos or sounds in the database and provide the most exact match.

Birding Camera:
Are you still using a heavy camera to photograph birds? A phone app can do this now! Focus your phone camera on a bird, zoom in on the bird to find the best position and the app will automatically sharpen the picture. The Picture Bird app lets you have the most pleasing bird sightseeing experience.

Bird Feeding:
Do you want to attract birds to your backyard, or do you want to help birds in need on winter days? Picture Bird can help! Use the filters, and choose your food type and feeder, you will get to know what birds you can attract and how to feed them.

Detailed Bird Info:
Full encyclopedia of bird info. In your identified results, you can get detailed bird info including bird appearance, sound, habitat, distribution, feeding habits, etc. The Picture Insect app also provides high-quality articles on bird ID, attracting tips, birding hints, bird sightings, and more.

Unique Collections:
Save your observations with the in-app collection function and easily manage your findings. Share your happiness with friends with unique bird cards.

Whether you are curious about the name of a bird you met, eager to learn bird-feeding tips, or want to educate your children, Picture Bird will help you in the easiest and most effective way.

Download the Picture Bird app today, and join a group of over one million bird enthusiasts to explore the wonderland and learn ornithology together!

-Subscription Duration:1 year(7 days trial)
-Subscription Description: Users will get a 1-year Picture Bird Premium which includes identifying birds without limits, getting answers from experts, studying birds with numerous info, and no watermarks or ads.

EGW Writings 2 application enables you to read, search, and listen to the complete published writings of Ellen G. White. Multiple additional resources are available such as 14 Bible versions, including the King James Version of the Bible. Plus, several Dictionaries including 1828 Noah Webster’s American Dictionary. With over 800,000 pages of resources available in the EGW Writings 2 app, it is the most complete Adventist resource available. The app continues our line of successful EGW Writings free apps for iPhone, iPad, iPad Pro, and iPod Touch developed by the Ellen G. White Estate.

What’s new in Version 7:
* Syncing of Study Center data and user history through EGW Cloud
* My Library
* Updated bookshelf layout
* Updated reader layout
* New reader toolbar
* Additional color themes and much more
* Advanced Search:
     - search in collections: All Collections, Compilations, Lifetime Works
     - ordered search
* New Book Covers
* Numerous bug fixes

About the Author:
Ellen G. White (1827-1915) is considered the most widely translated American author. Her works having been published in more than 160 languages. Guided by the Holy Spirit, she exalted Jesus and pointed to the Scriptures as the basis of one’s faith. Ellen White wrote on a wide variety of spiritual and practical topics, from spiritual, to health, education, ministry, financial and marital advice. Her best known most translated work is Steps to Christ, followed by the 5 Conflict of the Ages series: Patriarchs and Prophets, Prophets and Kings, Desire of Ages, Acts of the Apostles, and The Great Controversy. Ellen G. White is also credited as one of the 3 cofounders of the Seventh-day Adventist Church.

Materials Available:
* 120 Ellen G. White title’s
* Complete Published Writings title list: https://www.whiteestate.org/cdrom/cdrom.asp
* 6-volume Ellen G. White biography
* 21 Ellen G. White Devotionals
* 167 Ellen G. White Pamphlets
* 5,000 Ellen G. White Periodical articles
* 9347 Letters and Manuscripts Files (in 25 bound volumes)
* 13 Ellen G. White Miscellaneous Collections
* 21-volume Ellen G. White Manuscript Releases
* King James Version Bible (plus 11 other versions)
* 1828 Noah Webster’s American Dictionary

App Features:
* App now supports 137 languages
* Read or search either online or offline
* Sync reading and listening history with EGW Cloud
* Sync Study Center with EGW Cloud
* New Bookshelf layout with customizable display
* 4 major Collections all color coded
      *EGW in Blue
      *Reference in Gold
      *Bible in Burgundy
      *APL in Green
* Access to 14 Bible translations
* Quick direct access to an EGW book/page or paragraph using search 
(e.g. Education or Ed; Education 57 or Ed 57; Education 57.2 or Ed 57.2)
* Vertical or horizontal reading view available
* Quick reference access to the Bible using the abbreviated book codes. Also, you can go exactly to the chapter and verse if desired. (e.g. Jn, Jn 3, Jn 3:16)
* Navigate to any Bible verse quickly by tapping on the header while in the Bible to move to another verse.
* Horizontal left/right swipes to navigate to next/previous chapter
* Copy and paste text into other applications
* Add bookmarks to any Bible verse or EGW paragraph
* Search for highlighted words or phrases.
* Book reference location is always visible in the title bar.
* Search for words or “phrases” in the entire EGW library or KJV Bible
* Fast indexed search results with easy-scroll access to hits
* Easy navigation to search results highlighted within the chapter
* Daily Devotional Readings
* In EGW books all Bible references are hyperlinked
* Look up definitions in Dictionary
* Study Center: Bookmarks, Highlights, Notes
* Highlighting with 16 million colors
* Add bookmarks and highlights to topic folders
* Reading and audiobooks history
* Email or share a quote on Facebook, Twitter or other supported social networking apps
